text:
@RealBillRussell @realDonaldTrump @MSNBC @CNN Hey man, yeah, he's so stupid it took you to tell him there's a coronavirus out there and he's wrong to expect all of us old 'folks' to go to the polls.

Mail-ins are fine for 60+. Sign up. The rest of us vote at the polls where our votes are our votes. BTW Noone in WI caught it.
